idea:
Admitas Advisory Services Private Limited has built a higher education student support platform named ‘LilacBuds', which is an enterprise portal for industry mentors and college aspirants to connect with each other. The portal has a host of collaboration features and workflow implementations to assist both the mentor and student to achieve superlative outcomes. The data on the portal allows students to make an informed choice in terms of their university and course preferences. Our knowledge library allows mentors to share their experiences and give deep insights into international education and career prospects. We have used open source components wherever possible to ensure scalability and commercial viability of our portal.

As we expand our product offering, we are looking to add video conferencing capabilities for better collaboration, machine learning based unstructured data extraction from documents and Artificial Intelligence based content analysis capabilities to provide our students with detailed inputs to improve their chances of studying at the best universities. Also we are going to add a module for education institutes, so they can use LilacBuds to attract top quality research talent for their programs. We will continue to expand our partner ecosystem & have content tie-ups with local test preparation firms, data collection agencies, banks & NBFC's for financial support to students and other visa and forex related services.
name: ADMITAS ADVISORY SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Drapersclub Ecommerce Private Limited was founded with an objective to bring new age technolgies and systems to one of the oldest profession known to mankind.  We are high on research and development to create a scaleable solution. 

We have been experimenting with 3d modelling with body shape and fitting and finding ways with AI to create a futuristic business model. 

In the current scenario of COVID situation, we have come out with Word's first Novel AntiVirus Jacket that can help in reducing the public transmission of viral infections. We are looking for  funding to bring our product to mass scale.
name: DRAPERSCLUB ECOMMERCE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
vivèlogis - The plexus of global logistics

vivèlogis, our multi-enterprise digital platform, is uniquely

designed to enable you to orchestrate your entire inbound

logistics operations on a single platform and drive your

processes with clarity and decisiveness like never before. It

is your trusted ally that efficiently interconnects all the

crucial elements in your supply operations. Rest assured that

your objectives of on-time deliveries will be achieved along

with improved processes, enhanced visibility, reduced risks,

and increased efficiencies.

Bring your trade-lanes and supply entities together on one

platform to gain greater visibility, to transform your inbound

logistics operations with a swift, seamless, and secure

framework. Well, there's a lot more to vivèlogis, that we

would like you to explore with us.

Welcome to vivèlogis, the ‘plexus’ of global logistics!
name: SIVIVE ENTERPRISE SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED
